subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It came as no surprise when the Yankees announced on Wednesday that they would bid on the rights to negotiate with Japanese pitcher Daisuke Matsuzaka by the 5 p.m. deadline. The Mets were also expected to bid.
snippet: It came as no surprise when the Yankees announced on Wednesday that they would bid on the rights to negotiate with Japanese pitcher Daisuke Matsuzaka by the 5 p.m. deadline. The Mets were also expected to bid.
